StoryEventNotes: Gimignano is a sprawling metropolis, a city state with it's own system of government, independent from the rest of Italy.
The major three factions in the city are the Rifuiti, the Sciarpa fumante and the City council, backed by the police
The Rifuiti and the Sciarpa fumante are two rival mafia organisations, fighting over control in the city
The gang war was made easier when the city council approved an open carry policy for all weaponry
